description:
We add value to your business, whether you are an agency offering Video and Animation services to your clients or an end user who needs t ospread thier message in the most engaging way possible, we can work with you.
With a long list of happy clients in our portfolio including; Money Supermarket.com, City & Guilds, Virgin Media Business, BBC Top Gear, Timothy Taylors, City Car Club, Hunters Estate Agents,and various Colleges & Universities to name a few, we’ve spent a lot of time learning how to turn your business objectives into an entertaining, informative and engaging film that delivers your message efficiently and effectively. As a Motiv Productions customer, you can expect to enjoy a seamless journey from storyboard to finished production. We pride ourselves on building on your ideas, keeping the process simple and above all, ensuring that you get value for money.
